subject: [R] generating correlated Bernoulli random variables
body:
Hi all,
I was wondering how to generate samples for two RVs X1 and X2.

X1 ~ Bernoulli (p1)
X2 ~ Bernoulli (p2)

Also, X1 and X2 are correlated with correlation \rho.

Regards,
Vineet
